post:
Hi there,

Xsltel OÜ is one man show registered in Estonia and been in business since 2011. managing and automating everything from home.
I use “we”, “us” and “our” on this website, emails and communication channels to represent myself and my service obviously because it seems more professional to do that.

Over the past years we have served so many clients around the globe with very different and specific needs that made us very experienced in hosting industry.

Our [free cpanel hosting](https://www.xsl.tel/hosting/shared-web-hosting/free-cpanel-shared-web-hosting) is intended for testers, new comers and knowledge seekers
Our Lite plan comes with these features
5Gb SSD Disk space
50Gb Bandwidth
Unlimited domains
Free Lets Encrypt SSL
Location Germany (Hetzner)

For more in-depth resources limits, FAQs, terms of this offer you can check our [free hosting detailed page](https://www.xsl.tel/hosting/shared-web-hosting/free-cpanel-shared-web-hosting)

Due to cPanel per account pricing I'm not interested in keeping idle accounts on this server; I will purge inactive accounts everytime I reach 100 accounts limits.

Best regards
Mohammed H
